titles.title: The Rocks Shall Not Cry Out In My Place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The rocks shall not cry out in my place.
As long as I have breath to lift my voice and give Him praise,
As long as I can make a joyful noise,
I'll sing and shout.
And never let the rocks cry out.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For joy is mine; I will lift my voice.
I've got every reason under heaven to rejoice.
The God I serve is great, exalted high above the earth.
All creation shall declare it, but I've got to praise Him first.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O, praise to God; glory to His name.
He is so far above our ways that I cannot explain.
If He gave all His love to me, unfailing and unearned,
The rocks are going to praise Him,
But they'll have to wait their turn.
